name: EUROPEAN MARITIME PILOTS ASSOCIATION
goal:
To promote efficient and safe pilotage, safety at sea, protection of the maritime environment and security in European ports and fairways.
To collate and exchange information relating to the professional, financial, legal and social aspects of European maritime pilotage in general, with a view of securing sound legislative processes in Europe and on the global level.
To seek representation at meetings, conferences, conventions where matters concerning pilotage and safety at sea are being discussed.
To exchange information on best practices, innovation, training and education.
To establish and maintain regular contacts with the EU institutions.
To take part in EU reserach projects.
interests: Competition, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Research and Technology, Trans-European Networks, Transport
